rewrite1: Begin by adjusting the font size of the initial paragraph to 48 points. Next, modify the Outline Level to Level 2, and alter the font color to Indigo. Lastly, set the line spacing to a Single line.
rewrite2: Begin by reducing the font size of the initial paragraph to 48 points. Then, modify the Outline Level to Level 2. Proceed to alter the font color to Indigo. Lastly, set the line spacing to a Single line.
rewrite3: Begin by adjusting the font size of the initial paragraph to 48 points. Next, modify the Outline Level to Level 2 and alter the font color to Indigo. Finally, set the line spacing to a Single line.
